subject: Re: [junit] Re: How to remove a testMethod from TestSuite
msgSnippet: ... Well, look at the source, starting from where you suggested to start. Maybe the feature is there, maybe it isn t. I think you will be forced to create a
messageBody:
dantran wrote:

> In fact it is what I do: repackaging the test suite which belongs to
> some one else.
>
> but the prefer method is what I described previously.

Well, look at the source, starting from where you suggested to start.
Maybe the feature is there, maybe it isn't.

I think you will be forced to create a new TestSuite from the old
TestSuite by adding to the new one only the tests you want from the old one.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
